mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--JournalsItems 16-21identification; Nature; Whole issue. Articles of interest: "Letters to the Editor, The Permanence of Finger-Print Patterns" one by Henry Faulds in response to reading Herschel's pamphlet and one by W. J. Herschel on the exclusion of Faulds. An argument of sorts, p. 388-389.; various authors; v. 98, no. 2464; 12 pages; DF 545
